sections.Block_colour: //This is the colour of the block in the UI, it can be any hex code
sections.descriptor: //This is a description of the block, it will be shown in the UI when the user hovers over the block

sections.Code_Equivelant: //This is the code equivalent of the block, it can contain placeholders for the inputs, for example delay({time});
